name: Tomorrow Happened
description:
Tomorrow Happened is a mini game / generator game that was developed in one week by one Game Design student.
It aims to gather the different events that happened those last months in the world in an artistic and interactive way, but also to represent the overwhelming feeling that the news and the social medias can let us feel.
Put the sound on for a better experience.

Credits

Mylene Ben Osman (developer)

Facebook

Itch.io

flaticon.com




This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai
"Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
